name: The Decieved
description:
you play as some that has woken up in a random world , left with one choice wich is to go to a demonic creature...will you be decieved or will you not...



game controles : left and right arrows for movment (or A and D)
R: attack
Space: Jump

Theme: I went for the less enemies you kill the better the result is...couldn't get the entire idea out in time but at least some of it is here

Credits : thanks for my sister for doing the charecter art , and For OlePe for doing the enemies and tileset 

and one more thing make sure to try out the game twice as there are 2 different endings depending on how you played..

note : the music made in this game wasn't made during the jam , i had made it before but found out that it fits in here so i decided to use it
this is my first game jam , and my seconde project in game dev so far so i'd like having feedback if things are good or not and thanks ahead
